text: denʹ prybude koly deyaki oblychchya budutʹ brightened (z radistyu), v toy chas, yak inshi oblychchya budutʹ temnitysya (z neshchastyam). Yak dlya tsykh chyyikh oblychchya temnyatʹsya, vony budutʹ prosytysya, vy ne disbelieve pislya toho yak vvazhaty? Tomu, zaznayutʹ retribution dlya vashoho disbelief
